author: rootsid
title: RootsWallet - Presentation Exchange
description: Identity wallets require Presentation Exchange protocols for advanced interactions while requesting and providing verifiable information.

author: rootsid
title: RootsWallet beta - Backup/Recovery
description: There is no Cardano/Prism open source identity/credential wallet providing secure and familiar backup/recovery/pluggable/encrypted storage.

author: rootsid
title: RootsWallet beta - Social UX
description: There is no Cardano - Atala Prism open source identity/credential wallet mobile app focused on Catalyst grass roots identity project users.

author: aharon
title: DID for Democracy on the Blockchain
description: Coin voting is not democratic. DAOs need a wider range of decision making methods and influence power allocations, as quadratic voting etc.

author: henrik.metsamaki
title: Recruitment Utilizing Atala PRISM
description: Ethiopia is a rising star in blockchain in Africa but verifying competence in recruitment still labeled by lack of technology and corruption

title: PeopleCert DevOps Pilot on Cardano
description: Cardano is seeking significant partners for Atala PRISM. PeopleCert is a leading global certification company without a blockchain solution.

author: essbante
title: WAL-CLI Presentation Exchange
description: The Presentation Exchange protocol required to coordinate interaction between RootsWallet and WAL-CLI instances needs to be implemented.

author: kuni
title: AtalaPRISM hackathon with devillage
description: To promote AtalaPRISM, the concept of DID and SSI is not widely understood and the number of implementation cases is limited.

author: altimario
title: Lifelong Learning certif+AtalaPRISM
description: A certification is a snapshot of your knowledge at a certain time. This old snapshot doesn't say anything about your current competencies.

author: tefera
title: Decentralized Autonomous Iddir
description: Iddirs are an Ethiopian traditional risk sharing community organizations that has difficulty to scale.

author: michiel
title: Control your data via PRISM part 2
description: Today, companies have your data and (mis)use it for their benefit. People should control the use of their personal data and benefit from it.

author: zakiristesting
title: DemeterGift
description: There are still many challenges and problems that are being faced. In Africa there are more than 25 million people living with HIV.

author: cenkner
title: Study Buddy 3.0
description: There's no model for learners to create and share validated proof of what they know and can do without going through a centralized system.

author: elementarysoftware
title: Visual DID & Credential Builder
description: We need intuitive no-code tools to ensure adoption of decentralised digital identities (DIDs)

author: danbonfil
title: DID Community Course
description: Vocabulary and applications of DIDs to everyday life can be difficult to grasp, this could hamper the speed of its acceptance and adoption

author: rodolfo.miranda
title: Universal Resolver for did:prism
description: There are no drivers available to resolve Prism DID methods for the popular Universal Resolver of the Decentralized Identity Foundation

author: allisonfromm
title: PRISM DIDs for CA Onboarding
description: Anyone can be a CA & review proposals. While wonderful in many ways, this radical inclusivity can contribute to low quality assessments.

author: allisonfromm
title: PRISM DIDs for Catalyst CA Process
description: How do we increase accountability & transparence, build reputation systems, and experiment with voting while maintaining privacy for CAs?

author: sean.kelly38
title: Work Based Learning Credentials
description: Rapid expansion and growth of Atala PRISM & Cardano cannot occur without identifying & leveraging high-value credentials.

author: kasimba
title: Atala PRISM DID
description: Accelerate the adoption of decentralized identities (DIDs) in the Cardano Community with an ID for the Republic of Uzupis.

author: khilona.radia
title: Address Verification Ecosystem
description:
Multiple KYC SSI use cases start with ID verifiers but no address verifiers.

Inability to verify unbanked/unaddressed population groups.

author: heinz.gassner
title: DLT360: DID/ZKP & GDPR-Data Privacy
description: DLT/Blockchain is apparently in conflict with EU-Personal Data Privacy regulation and with major GDPR PbD (Privacy-by-Design) principles

author: benji.kok
title: Verifiable Digital Receipts
description: Insurers and Creditors can't utilize the valuable spend data captured in invoices and receipts at scale.

author: jkisner
title: International Healthcare & Cardano
description: International Health care services growing into Africa & Asia needs securing client & provider info to address security of data & payments.

author: proofspace.nick
title: Token-based PRISM credentials
description: It is hard to use blockchain-based transaction data to trigger useful interactions in real-world scenarios.

author: proofspace.nick
title: Support ADA pmnts in PRISM workflow
description: ADA value and PRISM VC usage can increase mutually, but triggering ADA payments through VC interactions requires wallet-level integration

author: metafrontier
title: MetaDID experiment × Aizu Lab
description: There does not appear to be a laboratory that studies Atala DID in Cardano .Thus many professors and students are not aware of Atala.

author: crjarove
title: Small Farmers DAO
description: Small farmers lack in self-organizing and self-governing production which hinders access to markets and the ability to negotiate fair prices

title: ATALA Prism Basic Income Protocol

author: chriskellerracing
title: Credentials and P2PDecentralized ID
description: Peer to Peer Community Identity can Accelerate onboarding for adoption for self verified groups. Tools need integration pathway

author: catsper
title: Boost Personal & Business Adoption
description: The rate of adoption of decentralized ID & Verifiable Credentials is limited by the amount of people who have a good user experience.

author: fsamvura
title: School Boards as Verifiers of DIDs

author: rhysstoic
title: NFTPass: Atala DID Integration
description: Passes for businesses and events are often tied to some form of Identity verification such as age or name & affiliation etc

author: jeffrey.downard
title: Resources for Refugees: Ukraine
description: Three million refugees have fled Ukraine. There are 82 million displaced people worldwide: 50% lack IDs, 80% lack adequate food & shelter.

author: dao.coders
title: DAO-NET: DAO Atala Prism DIDs

title: General Purpose Identification
